sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162520 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 연말정산귀속년도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM /* 금전소비대차일련번호 */ ,TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD /* 국세청자료구분코드 */ ,COMR_CDTR_NM /* G16_금전소비대차_대주성명 */ ,COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM /* G17_금전소비대차_대주주민등록번호 */ ,COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT /* G18_금전소비대차_계약기간시작일자 */ ,COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT /* G19_금전소비대차_계약기간종료일자 */ ,COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE /* G20_금전소비대차_차입금이자율 */ ,COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR /* G21_금전소비대차_원리금상환액합계 */ ,COMR_PRNIL_SUM /* G22_금전소비대차_원금금액 */ ,COMR_ITRT_SUM /* G23_금전소비대차_이자금액 */ ,COMR_DDUC_SUM /* G24_금전소비대차_공제금액 */ ,ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN /* 전자파일이관여부 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , LSOR_FNM , TXPR_DSCM_NO_ENC_CNTN , CTR_TERM_STR_DT , CTR_TERM_END_DT , LNPB_INTRT , AMT , PNAMT , INTR_AMT , DDC_AMT ,'Y' , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167230 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

INSERT INTO YE162520 ( YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutseptCd# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #comrCdtrNm# , #comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , #comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , #comrCnttPridEndDt# , #comrLoanItrtRate# , ((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) , #comrPrnilSum# , #comrItrtSum# , (((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) * 0.4) , #ectnFlTrnrCtlYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162520 SET YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# , DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , COMR_CDTR_NM=#comrCdtrNm# , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM=#comrCdtrResnRegnNum# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT=#comrCnttPridBgnnDt# , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT=#comrCnttPridEndDt# , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE=#comrLoanItrtRate# , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR=((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) , COMR_PRNIL_SUM=#comrPrnilSum# , COMR_ITRT_SUM=#comrItrtSum# , COMR_DDUC_SUM=(((NVL(#comrPrnilSum#,0) + NVL(#comrItrtSum#,0)) * 0.4) , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN=#ectnFlTrnrCtlYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

DELETE FROM YE162520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutseptCd# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CLUT_SEPT_CD) AS CLUT_SEPT_NM , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
YRTX_BLGG_YR=#edacRvyy#
CLUT_SEPT_CD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162520 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr#
CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE 1=1
YRTX_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_SEPT_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE162520 WHERE 1=1
YRTX_BLGG_YR = #searchKeyword#
CLUT_SEPT_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM , DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , COMR_CDTR_NM , COMR_CDTR_RESN_REGN_NUM , COMR_CNTT_PRID_BGNN_DT , COMR_CNTT_PRID_END_DT , COMR_LOAN_ITRT_RATE , COMR_PCLTT_AMTFT_AGGR , COMR_PRNIL_SUM , COMR_ITRT_SUM , COMR_DDUC_SUM , ECTN_FL_TRNR_CTL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE162520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE162520 SET COMR_DDUC_SUM = #comrDducSum# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND COMR_CALN_SEIL_NUM=#comrCalnSeilNum#
